title: S17 Ep31: TCT: Ripped From The Headlines & Dumb Crimes/Stupid Criminals
itunes:title: TCT: Ripped From The Headlines & Dumb Crimes/Stupid Criminals
description:
True Crime Tuesday presents: Ripped From The Headlines & Dumb Crimes/Stupid Criminals!

This week, Tim and Beer City Bruiser look over some true crime headlines that have been overlooked by the media due to other world issues going on!

A woman lures a man through a dating website for a terroristic revenge killing to avenge a dead Iranian General, A "Dorm Dad" takes it a few steps too far, and the true motivation behind the movie killer, Hannibal Lecter, is revealed!Â
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
